name.ch: 工程研究方法與專題討論

department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的是讓學生瞭解研究進行的完整過程，藉由研究問題分析、研究計畫規劃、資料蒐集工具介紹、研究方法介紹、研究成果報告撰寫與呈現介紹等課題的進行，讓學生瞭解如何規劃及進行日後的研究。此外，此課程將透過授課老師或邀請演講者對於過去研究成果與方法，以及未來研究課題之介紹，協助上課學生確立並完成日後學位論文的主題與計畫。
goal.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the thesis study processes, including study problem identification, research proposal planning, literature review, research methodologies selection and research outcomes presentation. Furthermore, this course exposes the students to understand the research outcomes, methodologies and future directions for all faculties in the CEM institute to choose their thesis directions.

outline.ch:
1.課程介紹 (Course Introduction)
2.學位論文研究與寫作簡介 (Introduction to Thesis Study and Writing)
3.研究問題分析與研究計畫規劃 (Study Problem Identification and Research Proposal Planning)
4.文獻蒐集方法與工具介紹 (Introduction to Literature Review Methods and Tools)
5.研究方法論介紹 (Introduction to Research Methodology)
6.營管所教授之研究成果、方法與未來研究課題介紹 (Research Outcomes, Methodologies and Future Directions for all Faculties)
7.研究成果呈現介紹 (Introduction to Research Outcomes Presentation)
8.研究計畫書報告與討論 (Research Proposal Presentation and Discussion)
outline.en:
1.Course Introduction
2.Introduction to Thesis Study and Writing
3.Study Problem Identification and Research Proposal Planning
4.Introduction to Literature Review Methods and Tools
5.Introduction to Research Methodology

7.Introduction to Research Outcomes Presentation
8.Research Proposal Presentation and Discussion

2.作業(每一教師上課完畢繳交一份心得報告或指定作業) (Homework): 40％
